name: Don't Trust The Game (Potato_Bot)
description: Don't Trust The Game is a short but fun rage little game made under 2 days in BenBonk's game jam. There is crappy jokes everywhere, this is my second game ever made and I think its my best so far. I would love to read your comments and idea so don't hesitate to comment. You can support me and this game by donating but any way .Thank you
